title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 18 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 18 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


More ballots found in Georgia, GOP officials intimidated in Wayne County, MI. Rush announces more contributions to the Support Our Heroes Campaign. Democrats attack Thanksgiving, Christians on deck. National Review, Never Trumpers suddenly attacking Biden after the election. Biden is a placeholder, Democrats want to install Kamala, will use Hunter Biden story to get rid of him. TIME Magazine did cover: Is Rush Limbaugh Good for America? Would they do the same thing to Zuckerberg and Dorsey? Blumenthal tells Dorsey he doesn't censor conservatives enough. Georgia keeps finding more Trump votes. It's not so easy for state legislators to disregard the popular vote to name electors. Trump's Operation Warp Speed: Pfizer says vaccine is 95% effective.                           


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Trump's Operation Warp Speed made record-fast COVID-19 vaccine possible by eliminating regulations, opening road for Big Pharma to make it. We still don't have an AIDS vaccine. Cuomo says Trump has nothing to do with the vaccine. Megyn Kelly moving out of New York. Will New York ever come back? Big fight coming over disputed election results. News just keeps getting worse for House Democrats. JFK-era Democrat caller is a vanishing breed. The Supreme Court will need solid evidence to overturn election, doesn't want to be seen as choosing the president.                                        


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


The Supreme Court will need to see solid evidence to consider overturning election. Lin Wood thinks Trump won a 70% landslide, over 400 electoral votes. A year of being told Trump would lose softened everybody up for this result. Trump gained millions of votes since 2016, Republicans won big down ballot and Trump loses? Bernie is like Hillary: He expects to be screwed by his own party. All the experts and pollsters predicted big Democrat wins in the House. Cuomo: Christmas is next. Drive-Bys, Dems, Never Trumpers call Wayne County, MI Republicans racist, get them to overturn their decision, certify election results. Sidney Powell thinks Trump got 80 million votes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
